sources.title: The Barnyard Brat (1939)
sources.description: The Barnyard Brat is a 1939 Hunky and Spunky animated short directed by  Dave Fleischer and Myron Waldman. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-barnyard-brat-1939/

metadata.Plot: Disobedient donkey Spunky's pranks create havoc amongst the sheep, geese and chicks until he's publicly decried; a barnyard bully is not more appreciated than a schoolyard one. But when the livestock go a little overboard with retaliation, they invite the wrath of mommy mule. One of several Hunky and Spunky adventures in the Fleischers' "Color Classics" series.
